Package org.odpi.openmetadata.repositoryservices.connectors.stores.cohortregistrystore.properties

Class CohortMembership

java.lang.Object
org.odpi.openmetadata.repositoryservices.connectors.stores.cohortregistrystore.properties.CohortMembership
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CohortMembership extends Object implements Serializable
CohortMembership describes the structure of the cohort registry store. It contains details of the local registration and a list of remote member registrations.
